entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries beginning near midnight then changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
